content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Describe how states can fight corruption.

Using the data in the graph, describe Russia’s score on the Transparency International Corruption Perceptions Index in 2008.

Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in Russia between 2008 and 2018.
